phrases.question: When ____ the book?
phrases.reply: She'll give it back to you in two weeks' time, she promissed

phrases.question: How many projects ____ when you finish this one?
phrases.reply: This is only my second project.

phrases.question: When ____ the portrait?
phrases.reply: Before the end of the day, I would say.

phrases.question: ____ the oil before we collect our car?
phrases.reply: Yes, I will. I'll have done it by one o'clock.

phrases.question: ____ if we come in two hours?
phrases.reply: I'm afraid it will start in an hour.

phrases.question: ____ her CV by the time she goes to the interview?
____ the top of the mountain before the sun sets?
phrases.reply: Don't worry. It's just two hours' walk.

phrases.question: ____ in a ten years' time?
answers: Will my hair have turned grey
